title: A Lifetime of Beauty: A Journey to Self Love
description: A RECIPE TO BE YOURSELF, LIKE YOURSELF AND CELEBRATE YOUR LIFE! A Lifetime of BEAUTY carries an enduring message of love and positivity; a beautiful book that seeks to empower readers with a boundless source of self love, self esteem and confidence. A Lifetime of Beauty is a heartful and inspiring tale of one girl's journey to discover the truth of what makes us beautiful human beings in a world that values the outside more than inside. Champion the power of self love with this uplifting story brimming with insights about how to build inner strength, believe in your individuality and love who you are, just as you are. A Lifetime of BEAUTY has been used in education as a book to build self-esteem, confidence and resilience for almost twenty years. It is endorsed and recommended by education professionals and psychologists across the globe.
author: Dr Gregory Landsman
